XIII.i.7.A.1.d
.
COE
A Certificate of Eligibility (COE) verifies to the lender that the Veteran or claimant is eligible for a VA-backed loan.Â  The RLCs are responsible for processing both paper and electronic COE applications.
Information on applying for a COE and the evidence needed to apply can be found through the
VA Home Loans
page.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 7, Section A - Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Home Loan Program
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 7, Section A
